In England, in the seven days to 03 September, there were 24,880 new confirmed cases (44.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 August, there were 24,749 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 1% (131 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 September is 19,861,556 (35,122 cases per 100,000 population).
